block.p: ALLOGGIAMENTO-Alberto, on September 29, 2000, at age 64. Beloved husband of Nancy. Dear brother of Attilio (Al). Adored sonin-law of Ruth Thomas and brother-in-law of Gary, Penny and Jim Thomas, and Toni and Ann Alloggiamento. Cherished uncle of Christine, Thomas, Arthur, Paul, John, Florence, Arlene, Mark, Matthew, Shannon, James and Jillian. Friends may call at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Avenue at 81st Street, on Tuesday, 7-9 PM. Mass of Christian Burial St. John Evangelist Church, 348 East 55th Street, on Wednesday, 10:30 AM. Interment St. John's Cloister, Middle Village, NY.
